BreadcrumbSectionInfo.heading: Digital Signature Certificate
BreadcrumbSectionInfo.title: Digital Signature
BreadcrumbSectionInfo.description: Digital Signature Certificate (DSC) is a secure digital key that certifies the identity of the holder, issued by a Certifying Authority (CA). It typically contains your identity (name, email, country, APNIC account name and your public key). Digital Signatures are used in India for online transactions such as Income Tax E-Filing, Company or LLP Incorporation, Filing Annual Return, E-Tenders, etc., to prove the identity of the sender.

subServices.title: Shops & Establishments License
subServices.tax: Government fees + applicable taxes and charges extra
description: Opening a commercial establishment? It is mandatory to get a Shops & Establishments License. Experts will handle the entire process for you and get you your license at the earliest.

subServices.title: FSSAI Registration
subServices.tax: Government fees + applicable taxes and charges extra
description: Every business operating in the food industry must register under FSSAI. You get guidance in choosing the right type of license for your business. Our experts will take care of the filing process and explain how to run your business as per the FSSAI rules to avoid being penalised.

subServices.title: ISO Certification
subServices.tax: Government fees + applicable taxes and charges extra
description: ISO certification assists every business with a mark of quality and high standards. With us, you get assistance with picking the right type of ISO certification for your business and we work with you on connecting with a trustworthy vendor and walking you through the entire process.

subServices.title: Import and Export Code
subServices.tax: Government fees + applicable taxes and charges extra
description: Want to be involved in an import/export business? You need an Import and Export Code for it. Get your IEC at the earliest with Vakilsearch. Our support team will guide you through the process and hand you your IEC on a silver platter

subServices.title: Trademark Registration
subServices.tax: Government fees + applicable taxes and charges extra
description: Your brand name is how your customers identify you. So protect it by registering a trademark with Vakilsearch. Our experts help you pick the right trademark classes and register your trademark for you. You can start using the symbol in 24 hours!

subServices.title: Trademark Watch
subServices.tax: Government fees + applicable taxes and charges extra
description: Trademark Watch ensures that no one tries to register a mark similar to your registered trademark. With our team of experts and sophisticated tools, we will watch out for businesses trying to register a mark similar to yours and send you timely reports on the same

subServices.title: Copyright Registration
subServices.tax: Government fees + applicable taxes and charges extra
description: Your work is your pride, but today it is easier than ever for people to steal your work and use it without your permission. Many creators don't copyright their work because of the hassle. With Vakilsearch you get the protection without the hassle as we take care of the entire process for you.

subServices.title: Patent Registration
subServices.tax: *Price depends on the scope of work
description: Inventing something is hard, but protecting your invention can be harder! Registering and getting a patent is difficult, but not with Vakilsearch. From patent search and listing the different uses of your invention to filing for patent protection, our experts take care of the complicated processes so that you get the due credit for your invention.

subServices.title: GST Registration
subServices.tax: Applicable taxes and charges extra
description: Get GST registration done for your business easily through Vakilsearch. Our experts will walk you through the entire process and file for you. We ensure you get your GSTIN at the earliest.

subServices.title: Professional Tax Registration
subServices.tax: Government fees + applicable taxes and charges extra
description: Professional life is hard enough, so why bother about the complicated process of professional tax registration when you can get the experts at Vakilsearch to do it for you?

subServices.title: Income Tax Returns
subServices.tax: *Price depends on the scope of work
description: Understanding the latest rules and available exemptions every year to file your tax returns can be nerve- wracking. Or you can get it done effortlessly through Vakilsearch!

subServices.title: TDS Return
subServices.tax: *Price depend's on the scope of work
description: An employer or company that has valid TAN - Tax Collection and Deduction Account Number can file for TDS return. Any individual or business who makes a particular payment which is stated under the I-T Act needs to deduct tax at source.

subServices.title: Maintain Your Account
subServices.tax: *Price depends on the scope of work
description: The book-keeping and accounting service includes basic financial consultation, bookkeeping, preparation of accurate annual financial statements and monthly reports, assistance in designing invoices, and taxation advice by financial experts. A steal-deal for the price we offer!

subServices.title: Annual Compliance Package for Pvt. Ltd. company
subServices.tax: *Price depends on the scope of work
description: The annual compliance tasks call for 9 different (and tedious) tasks which you would require different professionals to handle. We have consolidated the professionals so you can get it all done at a nominal price through a single package with Vakilsearch!

subServices.title: Due Diligence
subServices.tax: *Price depends on the scope of work
description: Due diligence involves assessing major aspects like business, legal, or/and financial aspects of a company. You can get it done easily using Vakilsearch's due diligence package instead of going through the hassle of engaging multiple professionals.

subServices.title: Secretarial Audit Package for Companies
subServices.tax: *Price depends on the scope of work
description: A secretarial audit is conducted to check if the company is compliant with all the relevant Acts including the Companies Act, 2013. This is mandatory for certain companies and can be a hectic task. Let our experts take up the audit for you!
